urlText: Foveaux St, temporary bus stop relocation
content: From 7pm Friday 12 to 5am Monday 15 March, Sydney Metro work will see the bus stop Foveaux St, Central Station (201039) temporarily relocated 100 metres east of its current location impacting all routes heading towards the city.
subtitle: Foveaux St, temporary bus stop relocation

urlText: Phillip St, temporary bus stop closure
content:
From 9pm Friday 12 March to 6am Monday 15 March, Parramatta Light Rail work will the intersection of Phillip and Church Streets.

The bus stop Phillip St after Church St (2150377) will be closed and the stop temporarily relocated on George St after Church St.
subtitle: Phillip St, temporary bus stop closure

content:
From 2am Saturday 13 March to 2am Monday 15 March, route 450 buses will not stop at Strathfeld Station, Albert Rd, Stand F (213563) due to trackwork buses using the stop.

Please catch route 450 services from Strathfeld Station, Albert Rd, Stand L (213519) during this time.
subtitle: Strathfield Station bus diversions

urlText: Trackwork between Tallawong and Castle Hill
content:
Saturday 27 and Sunday 28 March
  • Buses replace metro services between Tallawong and Castle Hill.
  • Metro services run between Castle Hill and Chatswood only.
  • Plan your trip before you travel for up-to-date information.
Bus route

11M: Tallawong, then all stations to Castle Hill and return
subtitle: Trackwork between Tallawong and Castle Hill

urlText: 04:55 Brisbane to Sydney XPT service delay.
content:
This service is delayed due to a medical emergency at Wauchope.


Use the Trip Planner for the latest travel information with real time updates.
subtitle: 04:55 Brisbane to Sydney XPT service delay.

urlText: Sydney Olympic Park diversions for Sydney Royal Easter Show
content:
From Tuesday 16 March until Monday 19 April route 525 services to and from Sydney Olympic Park will be diverting and using different stops while roads are closed for the Sydney Royal Easter Show (1 to 12 April).

Stops on Dawn Fraser Ave will be missed in both directions. Use alternative stops on Park St at Olympic Park Station instead. Check signs at bus stops and allow extra travel time.

For more information visit the Sydney Royal Easter Show event page.

Closed stops:
  • Dawn Fraser Ave near Edwin Flack Ave (212788)
  • Dawn Fraser Ave After Edwin flack Ave (212787)
  • Park St opp Olympic Park Station (212790)
subtitle: Sydney Olympic Park diversions for Sydney Royal Easter Show

content:
From 9pm to 5am the next day on Sunday 14, Tuesday 16 and Wednesday 17 March, bus services will divert and miss two stops while road closures are in place.

Closed stops
  • Howard Ave at The Strand (209954)
    The alternative stop is Howard Ave at Clyde Rd (209953)
  • Howard Ave after The Strand (209944)
    The alternative stop is Howard Ave at Avon Rd (209946)
subtitle: Dee Why bus diversions

urlText: T1 Western Line: Trackwork between St Marys, Richmond and Granville
content:
Saturday 27 and Sunday 28 March
  • Buses replace trains between St Marys and Granville, and between Richmond and Granville.
  • Trains run to a changed timetable between Penrith and St Marys, and between Granville and the City.
  • Plan your trip before you travel for up-to-date information.
Bus routes

31T1: Penrith, express to Central and return
32T1: Penrith, Blacktown, Parramatta, then Granville and return
34T1: St Marys, all stations to Granville and return
38T1: Parramatta, Harris Park, Granville and return
80T1: Richmond, all stations to Blacktown, Seven Hills, then Westmead, Parramatta, then Granville and return
81T1: Schofields, all stations to Blacktown, Seven Hills, then Westmead, Parramatta, then Granville and return
82T1: St Marys, Mount Druitt, then Blacktown, Seven Hills, Westmead, Parramatta, then Granville and return
subtitle: T1 Western Line: Trackwork between St Marys, Richmond and Granville
